programme.desc: Shoyo joins Karasuno High Schools volleyball club to defeat his rival Tobio, but finds out that Tobio is now his teammate.

programme.title: HAIKYU!! SEASON 1
programme.desc: Shoyo and Tobio take on their teammates, in a match that will determine if they will be allowed to join the team.

programme.desc: Kawai and Fuji are appointed to dog a drug dealer and his mistress. Kawai pairs up with Minamoto while Fuji with Yamada.

programme.title: POLICE IN A POD
programme.desc: Kawais senior, Shikine, always looks down upon his juniors and female police officers. But Kawai has to pair up with him.

programme.title: At Home With Marinka S1
programme.desc: Marinkas recipes for entertaining will impress dinner guests and showcase unique Indonesian flavors for the modern palate.

programme.title: At Home With Marinka S1
programme.desc: Marinka leads a hectic and busy lifestyle on a tight schedule. Most days, all she needs is a simple yet tasty and nutritious dish.

programme.title: Jason Tastes Asia S1
programme.desc: Jason visits local street food and savors some of the countrys tastiest rolls,including Goi Cuon Vietnamese spring rolls and Bo La Lot wild betel leaf beef rolls.

programme.title: Jason Tastes Asia S1
programme.desc: Jason travels back in time to the Spanish colonial period of the Philippines, when the Chinese began settling in the country.

programme.title: Star Vs Food Malaysia S1
programme.desc: The world collides when the Master Aznil and his decipher Aliff meet for the very first time in the kitchen to create Seafood Balado.

programme.title: Star Vs Food Malaysia S1
programme.desc: Action Star Bront Palarae meets the King of the Kitchen Chef Ismail to create aunthentic Negeri Sembilan food.

programme.title: Old Taste Detective S5
programme.desc: Henghua Lor Mee is a traditional noodle dish of the Henghua people. Host Bryan and Chef Petrina visit the few local traditional Henghua restaurants.

programme.title: SPIDERMAN
programme.desc: Average teenager Peter Parker is transformed into an extraordinary super hero after he is accidentally bitten by a radioactive spider.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS SEASON 14
programme.desc: Jamie works to bust a group of scammers who use artificial intelligence to defraud the elderly.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE SEASON 3
programme.desc: When a violent child abductor escapes from an emergency hospital visit, 15 Division goes on the hunt for the criminal only to discover that hes taken another young victim.

programme.title: SEAL TEAM SEASON 7
programme.desc: Even the closest of brothers fight eventually. Tempers flare during a surveillance mission in Malaysia. As the team sets up camp in scorching hot temperatures, grievances are aired and Drew finally reveals why hes been so closed off.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Matt Miller, Katie Greifeld and Sonali Basak deliver the marketmoving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Daffy causes trouble at the library and Porky the librarian tries to keep him quiet

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: Its the first day at Acme Looniversity, where we find Babs and Buster Bunny as they meet new friends tough gal Sweetie Bird, kind Hamton J. Pig, and narcissist Plucky Duck who are all kicking off their dreams to become professional toons.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball refuses to forward a scare email, the curse becomes all too real.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: After creating an unapproved mural on a wall at Aberdale Elementary, Clarence, Jeff and Sumo are forced to come to school on a Saturday to clean up as punishment.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Starfire mistakenly thinks shes killed Beast Boy, leading him to pose as a ghost and torment her.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: In order to abide by the clothing policy of their favourite Boba shop, the Bears get some new outfits. But with new looks come new lives including office work, fashion modeling, and even falling in love!

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: When their neighbour tries to bring over a package for them, Gumball and Darwin realise they have never learned his name, and its way too late to ask. They try everything to figure out what it is, but when they do they find out there are bigger secrets to learn about their neighbour than just his name...

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Ravens demon side has the same birthday as Beast Boy, so the Titans go to Azarath to celebrate her Sinister Sixteen.

programme.title: Jellystone!
programme.desc: Grape Ape crashes in the middle of town, turning Jellystone into a disaster zone! The citizens must band together to move this mountain of a monkey.

programme.title: Ninjago Dragons Rising
programme.desc: The Ninja confront Beatrix in the streets of the Imperium as Sora and Arin aid the resistance in hopes of turning the tide of battle.

programme.title: Mini Beat Power Rockers
programme.desc: Due to a new software update, Myo gets reprogrammed and loses her musicality.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After struggling to solve a riddle from Riddlers helicopter Quizz, Redbird must learn to speak up and share his ideas with the Batwheels if they hope to figure out the villains true scheme.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Melissa brags about helping Petunia to the point of selfaggrandizement.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider
programme.desc: After Avocado loses her beloved chew toy, Pokey Dokey, Lucas and Findley are determined to cheer her up at all costs.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Easter Bunny is sick, so she hires The Looney Builders to take over the festivities and ensure Looneyburg has a great Easter.

programme.title: Tangranimals
programme.desc: Chew balls are raining down on the TangraHut, bothering everyone except Yogo!

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: MacBarm is bringing his chickens a new trough full of feed, that is until it falls out of his truck and breaks. Grandma and her twin sister return to Treetop Woods to recreate their old zipline act.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: East Asia Tonight
programme.desc: Live Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. Well break down the key stories and explain why they matter.

programme.title: Money Mind
programme.desc: Money Mind is all about how to save, how to invest, and how to better spend your money. The show brings you weekly personal finance tips to help you make all the right money moves in Asia. Because, personal finance matters.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.desc: Three teens rechart their journeys Sulaiman juggles fatherhood, work, and classes Christine starts a digital marketing business and Afiqah prepares for NLevels and reunites with a mentor.

programme.title: Asia Tonight 20252026
programme.desc: Live CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with live reports and interviews to keep you uptodate on the days events.x000D

programme.title: Inside The Womens Prison
programme.desc: In the first episode of this threepart series, we follow six inmates as they navigate the rigor and realities of life behind bars. x000Dx000D

programme.title: MANO PO 5 GUA AI DI I LOVE YOU
A Son
programme.desc: A familys holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10yearold son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a longburied secret.

programme.title: Dangerous Gentlemen
programme.desc: The mountain retreat of Zakopane, 1914. Joseph Conrad and three notorious artists wake up after a crazy party with a dead man on their couch and not a clue who he is, why is he dead, and why the gendarmerie are knocking on their doors.

programme.title: Europa
programme.desc: Kamal has fled Iraq to try to enter Fortress Europe. At the TurkishBulgarian border, local mercenaries are ruthlessly hunting down migrants. Alone in the forest, Kamal has three days to escape.

programme.title: NAPOLEON DYNAMITE
programme.desc: An introverted teenager helps his new friend become class president while dealing with conservative town members and some bizarre characters at home.

programme.title: THE LEISURE CLASS
programme.desc: The winning entry from HBOs Project Greenlight about a man trying to marry into a wealthy family and his wild, unpredictable brother who could ruin everything.

programme.desc: Dom Cobb is a skilled thief, the very best at the dangerous art of extraction, stealing valuable secrets from deep within the subconscious mind.

programme.desc: Rick and the gang geek out when some cool items from the space program land in the store a U.S. flag from Apollo 16, an Apollo program book featuring a Charles Schultz signature and a far out meteoroid.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World S4
programme.desc: Two heavy hitting cereal rivals duke it out for breakfast dominance. Competition heats up when an idea is stolen, beaten to the market, and is a runaway success.

programme.title: The MegaBrands That Built The World S1
programme.desc: In the late 1800s Americans rarely bathed, lived in filthy conditions and deadly diseases were commonplace. But James Gamble and Harley Procter invent a revolutionary new soap that revolutionises America.

programme.title: Pawn Stars S24
programme.desc: When a seller whips into the shop with an Energy Dome hat made for the band DEVO, will Ricks offer top the charts? Then, Corey takes a shot at a decanter set that supposedly belonged to Buffalo Bill.

programme.title: Music Bank
programme.desc: The best tunes in Korea! the most sensational music show on TV satisfies all your senses! Fantastic performances and Aweinspiring harmony by the nations top musicians! Follow the latest trend in the Korean music scene through the Kchart, a summary of the weeks hottest songs.

programme.title: Queen of Mystery Season 2
programme.desc: Queen of Mystery is back! Housewifeturnedinvestigator Seolok and passionate detective Wanseung collaborate to solve mysterious cases and cure the hearts of those who were wounded by crimes along the way.

programme.title: My Merry Marriage
programme.desc: A family drama that questions the true meaning of happiness by showing various aspects of marriage such as divorce, remarriage, and late marriage.

programme.title: Cinderella Game
programme.desc: A story of a woman who realizes the meaning of true revenge while she has been used as a fake daughter by her enemy.

programme.title: KICKKICKKICKKICK
programme.desc: An office comedy drama with star actor Ji Jinhee and producer Jo Youngsik building up a content production company aiming for 3 million subscribers.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy visits two restaurants known for serving up old world comfort food classics Veselka in New York City and Canters in Los Angeles. Buddy learns Veselkas timehonoured technique of making pierogies.

programme.title: Move Or Improve S1
programme.desc: After building what they thought was their dream home, Felicia and Jereldes house no longer suits their needs. With a thriving meal prep business and limited space, Felicia is ready to find a new home.

programme.title: Move Or Improve S1
programme.desc: When Chante and Matt bought a house in Farragut, Tennessee they thought they were buying their dream home. But six years and eight adopted kids later, the home they once considered large is now too small.

programme.title: Buddy Valastros Cake Dynasty
programme.desc: When Sofia earns an internship with Daniel Boulud, Buddy is tasked with making a cake for the famous French chef and his staff. But a New Jersey heatwave threatens to ruin everything.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia S15
programme.desc: The contenders compete to win immunity from the upcoming elimination, with the Round 1 victor cooking against a pro for the prize of an immunity pin. First off, a coffeethemed challenge.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1
programme.desc: Follow the course of South Africas Orange river from its origins to where it spills out into the Atlantic Ocean. Along the way we encounter a diverse range of habitats and the creatures they support, from the dry lands of the Richtersveld to the beauty of Augrabies this is the story of the Linear Oasis. We reveal how life is adapted to survive along its course and discover a rich world of plants and animals.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: Planet Weird 1
programme.desc: Discover how weirdness is baked into some animals DNA from birth. Check out the bowerbirds funky mateattracting dance moves, the Christmas Island crabs trafficdodging prowess, and the sockeye salmons incredible uphill swimming skills.

programme.title: Planet Weird 1
programme.desc: Look at the supercharged abilities that give some animals an edge in life. Discover fireflies flirty flashes, the tarsiers incredible night vision, the mantis shrimps knockout punch, and the saltwater crocs preydetecting pressure sensors.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1
programme.desc: Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, redbilled gulls, whitefronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: ROUX DOWN THE RIVER THE THAMES

USA Hitlist!
programme.desc: From the Backstreet Boys to Britney, Mariah to Janet, Bon Jovi to Green Day its time to celebrate the best that the USA had to offer in the 1990s!

programme.title: Alternative Nation!
programme.desc: Become part of the 90s Alternative Nation right now on MTV 90s!

programme.title: Rock.Alt.Indie
programme.desc: Plug in your guitar and amp up the volume because were bringing you the best of the best from the Rock, Alternative and Indie scene!

programme.title: MTV Push Presents Mae Muller
programme.desc: After smashing down the competition to become 2023s UK entry for Eurovision, our girl Mae Muller chats to MTV about her unstoppable rise to pop superstardom!

programme.title: MTV Push Presents Teddy Swims
programme.desc: Teddy Swims chats to MTV about life, music and his rise to superstardom, and gives us exclusive performances of two of his tracks!

programme.title: MTV Push Presents Arrdee
programme.desc: Arrdee sits down with MTV to chat about life, music and his rise to superstardom, and gives us exclusive performances of some of his tracks!

programme.title: MTV PUSH Presents Armani White
programme.desc: Armani White chats to MTV about life, music and his rise to superstardom, and gives us exclusive performances of two of his tracks!

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: Weve got big hits and theyre even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7
programme.desc: News 7 is NHKs flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. Its presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet two foreigners in Tokyo. Former amateur champion dancer Daga Rutkowska from Poland trains with a paraathlete for a blind dance competition, and Chinese Zhang Ye works for a literary agency.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the days news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Since Russia began its invasion of Ukraine, Chujo Hideto has been working to support children who have been traumatized by the conflict. He talks about how he hopes to make a difference.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo Mini
programme.desc: Shirasu are baby Japanese anchovies. Known for their clear, silverywhite appearance, these tiny things are packed with umami and nutrients.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDOLIFE2
programme.desc: The top 3 geisha idol celebrities in Edo Tomimoto Toyohina, Takashima Ohisa, and Naniwaya Kita. See how Kitagawa Utamaro, the master of female beauty has illustrated them so differently.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the days news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Magical Japanese Kimono
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to kimono. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: 36 From what time to what time can we use the bath? To ask when something is open or available, put wa after the name of something, then nanji kara nanji made desu ka.

programme.title: Sing for Ukraine, Sing for Peace
programme.desc: Ukrainian musician Kateryna gives concerts all around Japan playing the bandura. Russias invasion prompted her to support displaced people in Japan, hoping her music will bring peace to her homeland.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLDJAPAN
programme.desc: This time, we introduce changes starting in April, including the extension of NHK NEWSLINE and the launch of NHK NEWS 7. We also feature Japan in Focus moving to weekdays.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Taylor reveals its his birthday, but how can his friends make it special when they had no idea? Its Burns Night and Mrs Bird teaches Paddington about a rare creature called a Wild Haggis, but will it visit them?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Great Egg Hunt has just begun, and Blaze and Crusher are racing all over town to see who can find the most eggs. Only the first truck to collect 100 eggs will win the eggceptionally tasty chocolate trophy!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Francois & Capn Turbot become stranded on a remote island,Ryder and the pups fly in to find and rescue the cousins. Its a double daring mid air rescue as Mayor Goodways first flying lesson goes sideways,the Pups make sure everyone lands safely.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Buddy Mayor Goodways gesture of goodwill gift grows wildly out of control when its planted in the wrong place. Time for a transplant! Metal mayhem ensues when Marshalls Fire Truck becomes mysteriously magnetized.

programme.title: Baby Sharks Big Show!
programme.desc: The Sharks travel to a tropical resort where Baby makes a plan to have the perfect vacation. Grandpa loses the TV remote and searches high and low to find it.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on Thse, a magnificent sailboat.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Itd Earth Day and Paddington has the important job of planting a tree, but will he find the perfect spot before it is too late? Baaz holds a Spring Harvest Festival, and everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, theyve got to build him a new home to bring the power back. When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora, Boots, and Benny have to trek through the rainforest to deliver a big, delicate tres leches cake to Bennys abuela. Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise that caused them to lose their instruments.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Thinking that Henry is not telling the truth about being sick, Ray plants cameras and microphones in Henrys house to catch him in a lie.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Charlotte is challenged to a fight at school, Captain Man and Kid Danger step in to try and help Charlotte defend herself.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The Loud kids help Flip clean up his image to impress his middle school crush. When the Morticians Club cant afford tickets to Casket Con, they decide to start a business to raise money.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Dad tears the house apart trying to find the cricket ruining his peaceful day alone in the house. Tired of getting pummeled during dodgeball, Lincoln and the gang use Clydes untapped rage without him knowing.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: After failing to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal on his show, the kids try to erase the footage before it airs. The kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The mutant seahorse called MUSTANG SALLY is going to flood the city... and the only thing standing in his way are LEO and Pigeon Pete. Being the leader isnt all its cracked up to be.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Krusty Krew builds a boat for their pennypinching captain. SpongeBob discovers a crazed castaway living in his walls.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob works the grill at the toughest joint in town. Karen looks after Spot while Plankton goes out of town.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Sandy gives her friends special saltwater trees, but they need more attention than she expected. SpongeBob and Patrick mistake a burglar for the tooth fairy.

programme.title: PAPILLES
programme.desc: Emmanuel Renaut is a competitor at heart a threestar chef and Meilleur Ouvrier de France, this workaholic never stops. From the Aiguille du Midi in HauteSavoie to the Valle de Joux in Switzerland, via Megve and Chamonix, well be tasting his mountain cuisine with him.

programme.title: UN SI GRAND SOLEIL
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lvy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: QUESTIONS POUR UN CHAMPION
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: AU BOUT DE LENQUTE, LA FIN DU CRIME PARFAIT ?
programme.desc: October 1995. The body of 26 yearold student Sbastien Faisant is discovered in a field in Montagnat, RhneAlpes. The only clue for the police a few days earlier he had used the Minitel Rose, an erotic chat service, to contact a libertine couple. Gradually, the investigators discovered a demonic duo.

programme.title: LE DESSOUS DES CARTES
programme.desc: Italy is divided between the favoured North and more precarious South. Its ageing population and the migration problems it is facing add to a unique political history. We look back at events and the phenomenon of Georgia Meloni, who is reviving a form of Italian neonationalism.
